title: Gigabyte's Best Notebook Just Got BETTER!  Aero 15 2019
description: The Gigabyte Aero 15 is a more advanced version of the original Aero 15X (which is now called the Aero 15 Classic by the way) with an AMOLED screen, better CPUs and upgraded GPU options.  It also has an updated design, more ports and better cooling.  let's take a deep dive unboxing to check it out.
